{{Infobox Olympic event |event = Sailing |games = 1992 Summer |image = [[file:50 pesetas 1992 barcelona 92 pedrera.png|195px]] |caption = 1992, 50 pesetas coin |venue = [[Barcelona]] |dates = July 27 to August 4 |competitors = 405 (322[[file:Mars symbol.svg|13px]] 83[[file:Venus symbol.svg|13px]])
|nations = 60 |teams = 256 |prev = [[Sailing at the 1988 Summer Olympics|1988]] |next = [[Sailing at the 1996 Summer Olympics|1996]] }} '''[[Sailing|Sailing/Yachting]]''' is a [[Olympic sport]] starting from the Games of the 1st [[Olympiad]] ([[Sailing at the 1896 Summer Olympics|1896 Olympics]] in [[Athens]] {{GRE}}). With the exception of [[1904 Summer Olympics|1904]] and possible [[1916 Summer Olympics|1916]] sailing was always a part of the Olympic program. The Sailing program of 1992 consisted of a total of ten sailing classes (disciplines). For each class races were scheduled from July 27, 1992 to August 4, 1992 of the coast of [[Barcelona]], [[Spain]] on the [[Mediterranean Sea]] == Venue == {{Infobox settlement | name = Port Olympic, [[Barcelona]] | image_seal = | image_skyline = Puerto-olympico-marqueta.jpg | image_caption = [[Scale model]] of the Port Olympic | image_flag = | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 41 |latm = 23 |lats = 03 |latNS = N | longd = 02 |longm = 11 |longs = 55 |longEW = E }} [[image:1992 Olympic Course area's (OpenStreetMap).png|300px|thumb|left|Barcelona Olympic Course Area's 1992.]] According to the IOC statutes the contests in all sport disciplines must be held either in, or as close as possible to the city which the IOC has chosen. The weather conditions in Barcelona were found suitable for sailing. The waterfront of Barcelona was completely restructured for the Olympics. The Olympic port became one of the key Olympic areas of Barcelona. The Olympic sailing competition was held in the Mediterranean waters outside the Olympic Harbor. The new harbor was designed to be the base for the Olympic sailors and a key factor in the opening up of the city to the sea. This was achieved by a Special Town Plan for the âParc de Marâ Area including a harbor which satisfy the requirements of sailors and organizers. The new harbor serves after the Games as a marina. A total of five race areas were created on the Mediterranean Sea. {{clear}} == Competition == === Overview === {| class="wikitable" !width=50|Continents !width=50|Countries !width=50|Classes !width=50|Boats !width=50|Male !width=50|Female |- | align="center"| 6 || align="center"| 60 || align="center"| 10 || align="center"| 256 || align="center"| 322 || align="center"| 83 |} === Continents === * [[Africa]] * [[Asia]] * [[Australia (continent)|Australian continent]] * [[Europe]] * [[North America]] * [[South America]] === Countries === {| [[Image:Sailingmap OG 1992.png|thumb|260px|left|Countries that participated in the Sailing event of the 1992 Olympic Games.

Total !! 35 !!116!!108!!101!!309 |} == Remarks == === Sailing === * It was the first Olympic sailing contest were besides [[fleet race|fleet racing]] also a combination format of fleetracing and [[match race|match racing]] was used. The [[Soling]] was utilized for this format. === Sailors === During the Sailing regatta's at the 1992 Summer Olympics among others the following persons were competing in the various classes: * Royalties ** {{flagIOCteam|ESP|1992 Summer}}, [[Felipe, Prince of Asturias|Prince Felipe]] of [[Spain]], as midperson in the Soling {{Gallery |title=Sailors at the 1992 Olympic Games |width=100 |height=100 |lines=3 |File:Felipe, Prince of Asturias.jpg|In Soling:
